     \n                   \nfolds <- vfold_cv(bundle_train, \n                  v = 3,\n                  repeats = 1,\n                  strata = response)    \n                   \nctrl <- extract_parameter_set_dials() %>%\n   recipes::update(\n      min_n = min_n(range = c(40,60)),\n      tree_depth = tree_depth(range = c(11,30)),\n      learn_rate = learn_rate(range = c(-1,-2)),\n      num_leaves = num_leaves(range = c(200,300))\n   ) %>%\n   dials::finalize(raw_df)                 \n\nburnin <- tune_grid(\n  wf,\n  grid = 5,\n  resamples = folds,\n  control = ctrl,\n  metrics =
